public boolean setTradeMode(Game.ChatMode mode)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the trade accept mode
        Parameters:
        mode - The ChatMode to set the trade button to.
        Returns:
        true if item in menu was clicked; otherwise false.
        See Also:
        setChatOption(int, ChatMode)

      • showAllChatMessages

        @Deprecated
public void showAllChatMessages()
        Deprecated. 
        Left clicks the first chat button at the bottom of the screen to turn on the showing of all chat messages.
        See Also:
        setChatOption(int, ChatMode)

      • showGameChatMessages

        @Deprecated
public void showGameChatMessages()
        Deprecated. 
        Left clicks the game chat messages button at the bottom of the screen to enable the showing of all game messages.
        See Also:

      • getLastMessage

        public java.lang.String getLastMessage()
        Access the last message spoken by a player.
        Returns:

      • openTab

        public boolean openTab(int tab)
        Opens the specified tab at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        tab - The tab to open.
        Returns:
        true if tab successfully selected; otherwise false.
        See Also:
        openTab(int tab, boolean functionKey)

      • open

        public boolean open(int tab,
           boolean functionKey)
        Opens the specified tab at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        tab - The tab to open, functionKey if wanting to use function keys to switch.
        functionKey - Use a function key for fast switching?
        Returns:
        true if tab successfully selected; otherwise false.

      • openTab

        public boolean openTab(int tab,
              boolean functionKey)
        Opens the specified tab at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        tab - The tab to open, functionKey if wanting to use function keys to switch.
        Returns:
        true if tab successfully selected; otherwise false.

      • closeTab

        public void closeTab()
        Closes the currently open tab if in resizable mode.

      • mouseChatButton

        public boolean mouseChatButton(int button,
                      boolean left)
        Click chat button.
        Parameters:
        button - Which button? One of CHAT_OPTION
        left - Left or right button? Left = true. Right = false.
        Returns:
        true if it was clicked.

      • getCurrentTab

        public int getCurrentTab()
        Gets the currently open tab.
        Returns:
        The currently open tab or the logout tab by default.

public int getEnergy()

        Gets the current run energy.

      • switchWorld

        public boolean switchWorld(int world)
        Switches to a given world.
        Parameters:
        world - the world to switch to, must be valid.

      • isOnLogoutTab

        public boolean isOnLogoutTab()
        Checks whether or not the logout tab is selected.
        Returns:
        true if on the logout tab.

      • logout

        public boolean logout(boolean lobby)
        Closes the bank if it is open and logs out.
        Parameters:
        lobby - true if player should be logged out to the lobby
        Returns:
        true if the player was logged out.

      • isFixed

        public boolean isFixed()
        Determines whether or no the client is currently in the fixed display mode.
        Returns:
        true if in fixed mode; otherwise false.

      • isLoggedIn

        public boolean isLoggedIn()
        Determines whether or not the client is currently logged in to an account.
        Returns:
        true if logged in; otherwise false.

      • isLoginScreen

        public boolean isLoginScreen()
        Determines whether or not the client is showing the login screen.
        Returns:

        Determines whether or not the welcome screen is open.
        Returns:
        true if the client is showing the welcome screen; otherwise false.

      • getClientState

        public int getClientState()
        Gets the game state.
        Returns:
        The game state.

      • getPlane

        public int getPlane()
        Gets the plane we are currently on. Typically 0 (ground level), but will increase when going up ladders. You cannot be on a negative plane. Most dungeons/basements are on plane 0 elsewhere on the world map.
        Returns:
        The current plane.

      • getBaseX

        public int getBaseX()
        Gets the x coordinate of the loaded map area (far west).
        Returns:
        The region base x.

      • getBaseY

        public int getBaseY()
        Gets the y coordinate of the loaded map area (far south).
        Returns:
        The region base y.

      • getMapBase

        public RSTile getMapBase()
        Gets the (x, y) coordinate pair of the south-western tile at the base of the loaded map area.
        Returns:
        The region base tile.

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Gets the canvas height.
        Returns:
        The canvas' width.

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Gets the canvas height.
        Returns:
        The canvas' height.

        Gets a color corresponding to x and y co ordinates from the current game screen.
        Parameters:
